Mayor & Town Council
====================

Town Council
------------

[Members](https://townofsunnyvale.civicweb.net/portal/members.aspx?id=10)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Sunnyvale Town Council consists of six members and a Mayor.

* [Saji George - Mayor - Email](mailto:mayor.george@townofsunnyvale.org)
* [Ryan Finch - Mayor Pro-Tem/Council Member Place 1 - Email](mailto:councilmember.finch@townofsunnyvale.org)
* [Kevin Clark - Council Member Place 2 - Email](mailto:councilmember.clark@townofsunnyvale.org)
* [Manu Danny - Council Member Place 3 - Email](mailto:manu.danny@townofsunnyvale.org)
* [Holly Garland - Council Member Place 4 - Email](mailto:holly.garland@townofsunnyvale.org "Council member - Jim Wade")
* [Larry Allen - Council Member Place 5 - Email](mailto:councilmember.allen@townofsunnyvale.org)
* [Dr. George Woodrow Jr. - Council Member](mailto:george.woodrow@townofsunnyvale.org)[Place 6 - Email](mailto:councilmember.freeman@townofsunnyvale.org)

[Meetings](https://townofsunnyvale.civicweb.net/Portal/MeetingInformation.aspx?Id=230)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Town Council holds regular public meetings at 7 p.m. on the second and fourth Monday of each month in the Council Chambers, located at Town Hall 127 N. Collins Rd, Sunnyvale, TX 75182.

The Council may also call special meetings. All meetings are posted in accordance with the Open Meetings Act. Check the [meeting calendar](https://townofsunnyvale.civicweb.net/Portal/MeetingSchedule.aspx) for updated meeting information.

The Town Council welcomes you to speak on any agenda item, but respectfully requests that a [Public Meeting Appearance Card](https://www.townofsunnyvale.org/DocumentCenter/View/5742) be completed and submitted to the Town Secretary prior to the Council meeting by email or in-person before the meeting begins. This information is required by law to be included as part of the official record.

[View Previous meetings](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVEGdxkr5pxsFxcu8woFrVw/videos)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2024 State of the Town Presentation Feb. 28, 2025
-------------------------------------------------

2023 State of the Town Presentation Feb. 22, 2024
